title: How to Catch Zapdos in Pokémon Leaf Green

steps.title: Get the Surf HM.
steps.content: Get the Surf HM. If you do not have that, you'll need to find and go to the secret house in the Safari Zone in Fuchsia City.

steps.title: Fly or walk to the Rock Tunnel on Route 10.
steps.content: Fly or walk to the Rock Tunnel on Route 10. You'll see water that you can surf on.

steps.title: Go to the top right of the Pokémon Center to find the surfable Area.
steps.content: Go to the top right of the Pokémon Center to find the surfable Area. Surf on the water until you run into a small island with a building.

steps.title: Once you go into the building, you will run into a small, easy maze.
steps.content: Once you go into the building, you will run into a small, easy maze.

steps.title: Once you get through the maze, you will see a giant yellow bird.
steps.content: Once you get through the maze, you will see a giant yellow bird. Save before you do this, for you only have one chance to catch him. Zapdos is level 50, and very hard to catch. If you accidentally made it faint or you ran out of Poké Balls, restart the game. Try both a ground-type Pokémon to weaken him, and a flying-type one to lower his health. Try not to use your Master Ball for this. It is possible to catch Zapdos with an Ultra Ball, so load up on those before you battle.
